definition: no longer on or in contact or attached, not performing or scheduled for duties, kill intentionally and with premeditation
details:
adverb
- no longer on or in contact or attached
= example: no longer on or in contact or attached
- from a particular thing or place or position (`forth' is obsolete)
= synonyms: forth
- at a distance in space or time
= example: at a distance in space or time
= synonyms: away
adjective
- not performing or scheduled for duties
= example: not performing or scheduled for duties
- not in operation or operational
= example: not in operation or operational
- (of events) no longer planned or scheduled
= example: (of events) no longer planned or scheduled
= synonyms: cancelled
- below a satisfactory level
= example: below a satisfactory level
- in an unpalatable state
= synonyms: sour, turned
verb
- kill intentionally and with premeditation
= synonyms: hit
